text: Trey Lewis (born May 23, 1985 in Topeka, Kansas) is an NFL football player. He plays defensive tackle for the Atlanta Falcons. Lewis began playing for the Falcons in 2007. ==Other websites== *Atlanta Falcons bio *Article about Trey Lewis being drafted *Trey Lewis Stats at Pro Football Ref. title: Trey Lewis
